Description: Hoe Hoe Hoe
ActualRequirements: Craft a wooden, stone, iron, gold or diamond hoe

Description: Plant a sapling
ActualRequirements: Place any type of sapling

Description: Crunch into an apple
ActualRequirements: Eat an apple

Description: Use shears to obtain a leaf block
ActualRequirements: Obtain any leaf block

Description: Use shears to pick up tall grass or ferns
ActualRequirements: Obtain either grass or ferns

Description: Get a deadbush cause you're a noob
ActualRequirements: Obtain a dead bush

Description: Plant down all types of saplings
ActualRequirements: Place: Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, Cherry and Bamboo saplings, Azaleas, Flowering Azaleas and Mangrove Propagules

Description: Plant a Mangrove Propagule in a Grove biome
Craft and eat a normal golden apple
Eat an Apple every day for 30 in-game days
ActualRequirements:
The day counter increments when the player eats an apple on a day that they haven't eaten an apple yet.
Every sunrise, it will check if at least one apple was eaten in the previous day. If there wasnâ€™t, it will reset the day counter for apples.
If there was, it resets the apple eaten scoreboard, meaning the player will need to eat another apple on this day

Description: Pick and eat some Sweet Berries
Get stuck in a Sweet Berry Bush. Oh, icky yucky goo!
ActualRequirements: Enter a sweet berry bush block

Description: Gather both types of mushroom
ActualRequirements: Obtain a red and brown mushroom

Description: Slurp some mushroom stew
ActualRequirements: Eat a mushroom stew
Notes: Known as "Mushroom, mushroom, mushroom, mushroom!" until 1.9

Description: Grow a giant mushroom and then harvest it with silk touch
ActualRequirements: Obtain a red or brown or stem mushroom block
ItemRewards: 8 Bone Meal, 4 Red Mushrooms, 4 Brown Mushrooms

Description: Slurp some suspicious stew and pray you don't suddenly see giant flying eyeballs in the sky
ActualRequirements: Eat a suspicious stew

Description: Slurp every type of suspicious stew
ActualRequirements:
Eat Suspicious Stew with the following flowers added: Oxeye Daisy, Cornflower, Lily of the Valley, Wither Rose, any Tulip, Azure Bluet, Allium, Poppy,
and either Blue Orchid or Dandelion

Description: Harvest some sugar cane from a river or an ocean
ActualRequirements: Obtain sugar cane

Description: Obtain some ink from hunting a squid
Hunt enough Squids to collect a stack of Ink Sacs
Use a book, ink and a feather to craft a book and quill
Finish writing in your book or get a book from another player
ActualRequirements: Obtain a written book

Description: Collect some kelp from an ocean
Craft a dried kelp block for use as a great fuel source
Craft a full stack of dried kelp blocks
Eat nothing but dried kelp for three in-game days
ActualRequirements: Eat dried kelp once; in the following three in-game days, eat nothing but dried kelp.

Description: Break down a cactus in a desert
ActualRequirements: Obtain a cactus

Description: Run into a cactus
ActualRequirements: Take damage from touching a cactus

Description: Plant a seed and watch it grow
ActualRequirements: Place wheat, melon, pumpkin, beetroot, nether wart or torchflower seeds, or a pitcher pod

Description: Beetroot soup gives you souperpowers!
ActualRequirements: Eat a beetroot soup

Description: Grow wheat and use it to bake bread
ActualRequirements: Eat bread

Description: Wheat, sugar, milk and eggs!
ActualRequirements: Craft cake

Description: Craft a full stack of hay blocks
Eat 100 slices of cake
Obtain some cocoa beans from a jungle
Bake some cookies... and then scoff them all yourself
ActualRequirements: Eat a cookie

Description: Plant some cocoa in the nice steamy Nether
ActualRequirements: Place cocoa beans in the Nether

Description: Harvest some spooky pumpkins
Bake a pumpkin pie
ActualRequirements: Obtain a pumpkin pie

Description: Do you want to build a snow golem?
Notes: Known as "Do you want to build a snowman?" until 1.9

Description: Shear the Pumpkin off of a Snow Golem to unveil their true face
Carve a full stack of pumpkins
ActualRequirements: Obtain 64 Carved Pumpkins

AdvancementName: The melon! The melon! The melon!
Description: Eat a melon. Be careful not to drop it over a cliff
Craft 9 melon slices back into one block that, when broken, will probably not give you all 9 slices back
Parent: The melon! The melon! The melon!
ActualRequirements: Craft a melon block
Notes: Known as "Breaking the law of conservation of matter" until 1.9

Description: Craft a full stack of melon blocks
Squash and eat a potato
ActualRequirements: Eat a potato or baked potato

Description: Eat a poisonous potato
Eat a golden carrot
Craft a composter using wooden slabs then place it
ActualRequirements: Place a composter

Description: Fill up a composter
Use bone meal to grow a sapling into a tree
ActualRequirements: This advancement is awarded when the sapling actually turns into a tree

Description: Use bone meal on everything that can be grown
ActualRequirements:
Use Bone Meal on: Wheat Seeds, Carrots, Potatoes, Beetroot Seeds, Bamboo, Melon Stem, Pumpkin Stem, all six types of Saplings, Sunflowers, Lilacs, Rose Bushes, 
Peonies, Grass (so it turns into Tall Grass), Fern (so it turns into Large Fern), Seagrass (so it turns into Tall Seagrass), Red Mushroom, Brown Mushroom,
Cocoa, Sweet Berry Bush, Sea Pickles, Kelp, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Crimson Fungus, Warped Fungus, Glow Lichen, Small OR Big Dripleaves, 
Cave Vines, Azalea, Flowering Azalea, Mangrove Propagule, Mangrove Leaves, Rooted Dirt, Cherry Sapling, Torchflower Crop, Pitcher Crop, Pink Petals
Bone meal does NOT need to be used on blocks that randomly grow a spread of plants (e.g. Grass, Nylium, Moss, underwater blocks to get Seagrass, etc)
Known bug: Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, Azaleas, Flowering Azaleas and Mangrove Propagules only count if you bone-meal them but they don't immediately grow. 
This is due to how the item_used_on_block trigger works and can't be fixed, but bear this in mind.

Description: Compost every type of compostable item in a Composter
ActualRequirements: Compost the following items: https://minecraft.wiki/w/Composter#Composting

Description: Plant every single type of crop on farmland
ActualRequirements: Plant wheat seeds, beetroot seeds, melon seeds, pumpkin seeds, carrots, potatoes, torchflower seeds and pitcher pod

Description: Completely use up a diamond hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
ActualRequirements: Break a diamond hoe
Notes: Refusing to change since snapshot 20w20a (1.10 Beta Build 10)

Description: Fill both your hunger bar and saturation level
ActualRequirements: Both your hunger level and saturation level must be 20

Description: Eat every type of fruit, vegetables, and any sort of plant matter
ActualRequirements:
Eat the following foods: Apple, Mushroom Stew, Bread, Golden Apple, Notch Apple, Melon, Carrot, Potato, Baked Potato, Poisonous Potato, Golden Carrot, 
Pumpkin Pie, Chorus Fruit, Beetroot, Beetroot Soup, Dried Kelp, Suspicious Stew, Sweet Berries, Honey Bottle, Glow Berries, Cookie

Description: Eat every type of meat, even if uncooked or rotten
ActualRequirements:
Eat the following foods: Raw Porkchop, Cooked Porkchop, Raw Fish, Salmon, Clownfish, Pufferfish, Cooked Fish, Cooked Salmon, Raw Beef, Steak, 
Raw Chicken, Cooked Chicken, Rotten Flesh, Spider Eye, Rabbit, Cooked Rabbit, Rabbit Stew, Mutton, Cooked Mutton

Description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you
ActualRequirements: Eat every food required for "Vegetarian" and "Meat Lovers"

Description: Obtain a full stack of all the foods
ActualRequirements: Obtain a stack of every food required for "Vegetarian" and "Meat Lovers"
